archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Provide Manage Loyalty Program Account Notification
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Provide a notification to the Provide Loyalty Account Communication process, which manages operational communications with a loyalty program participant.

properties.value: Provide Manage Loyalty Program Account Notification provides a notification to the Provide Loyalty Account Communication process, which manages operational communications with a loyalty program participant. For example, when the currency earned qualifies the participant for a higher tier in the program.
